entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who is trying to concentrate on her work but is unable to do so due to Ron's handling of a situation. She is also shown to be knitting hats for house-elves in her free time.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who handled a situation by himself and is now being criticized by Hermione for not doing it properly. He is also shown to be watching Hermione with concern for her sanity.

entities.name: merlin
